subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Curlin ran a half-mile in 52.80 seconds in his first official workout on Santa Anita’s synthetic surface. It was the first timed workout for Curlin since he won the Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont Park on Sept. 27 .Curlin might defend his title in the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic on Oct. 25 at Santa Anita, depending on how he adapts to the new Pro-Ride surface. This year’s Breeders’ Cup will be run for the first time on a synthetic surface, and the Classic would be Curlin’s first race on such a surface.
